K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-1: lus kyi zag pa sbyin par gtong ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-3: aom aa sra ma ha re bhya:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-5: aom aa khre ra aa ha re bhya:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-7: aom aa si gha na aa ha re bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-9: aom aa ma la aa ha re bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-11: aom aa bhi stha aa ha re bhya:sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437a-13: aom aa nu tta aa ha re bhya:sv'ah'a de rnams so so la de dag za ba rnams kyis thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437b-0: de rnams de ltar byin pa'i bsod nams ci bsags pa thams cad sems can @437b thams cad kyi don du byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437b-1: 'di dag ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdo rgyud nas phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-010:437b-2: ba ri lotstsha bas bsgyur ba'o //
